title: 1D kinematics - v-t graph from motion diagram

content.question: Which of the following provides a velocity-time graph that could correspond to the diagram and provides correct reasoning? Velocity-Time Graph Reasoning A The distance traveled by the block during each half-second interval increases, so the velocity of the block must increase. B The block is traveling in the positive <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-direction, so the velocity graph must have a positive slope. C The force of friction exerted on the block causes the acceleration of the block to decrease. D The block reaches a constant speed.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
